name: Rout
description:
Your ferocity tips momentum in your favor, each fallen foe spurring your allies to strike harder.

When you knock a foe unconscious, use your reaction to give you and your allies a temporary +1d to attack rolls. If you or an ally knocks another foe unconscious before the end of your next turn, the bonus increases to +2d. This bonus continues from round to round, but ends if, at the end of your turn, neither you nor an ally has knocked a foe unconscious in the last round.

Describe how each victory pushes your group to fight with greater fury.
